effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

Jewel of the Firelord

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,690 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,044 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 229,317 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,716 Agility and absorbing 1.1 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,089 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 245,730 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 68,259 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
